Synonyms.Synonym: Fecal occult blood test -- guaiac smear
Stool occult blood test -- guaiac smear

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Stool guaiac test
QAPair.Answer: The stool guaiac test looks for hidden (occult) blood in a stool sample. It can find blood even if you cannot see it yourself. It is the most common type of fecal occult blood test (FOBT). Guaiac is a substance from a plant that is used to coat the FOBT test cards.
